summary: This document contains various Schedule K-1 forms related to the partnership MIDWAY-CAROLINAS 2012 LLC and its partner BLUE CHIP CAPITAL, LLC for the tax year 2012. It details the income, deductions, and credits allocated to the partners, as well as their respective shares of profits and losses.
